trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Stockton
There were no other sightings in Stockton on or around October 9th 2012
Summary: A small metallic object -like a flashlight object with a glowing orange/pink/red top hovered over the power lines for five minutes then disappeared.
divs: sighting detailsi let the dog out and looked up and this object (probe like) was hovering over the power lines. i watched and it appeared to be close to the garage about 10-15 feet in the air. it looked like a metallic flashlight but much bigger and seemed to hover for about 5 minutes or so before moving quickly to the right then disappearing. it was silver on the bottom and the top was glowing a red\pink\orange color.it was absolutely silent. i felt very shocked and excited to see something like that. i was wondering if anyone else in the area saw anything similar?
